name: Cargo Hill Road Auto
description:
Cargo Hill Road Auto is very interesting game you have to drive heavy vehicles.
Experience driving a heavy trailer truck in this truck driving simulation. Be the professional truck driver and handle the truck carefully making sure the loaded vehicles are safe.
Features:
• Real Experience of Off road Cargo transporter
• Many Exciting Game play Missions
• Smooth and Realistic Steering, Brakes, Drifting & Lifting
• Amazing 3D Graphics & City Environment
